name: DIRT AWARENESS
description: 12 tracks Recordered and mixed at Audio Crime Recordings - Turin, Italy Mastered by the Swedish producer Fredrik Nordstrom at Fredman Studios (At The Gates, Job For a Cowboy, Bring Me The Horizon, Dimmu Borgir, In Flames, Darkest Hour) In stores with Rising Records UK for 27 February 2012. Payable with Paypal and Postepay. Shipping cost will be 6€ for Italy, 10€ for the other countrys. Per chi acquista dall'Italia: accettiamo pagamenti anche tramite ricarica postepay. Se intendete pagare con questo metodo non ordinate qui ma contattateci per i dettagli info@corroosion.com

name: PUNISH THE MIND
description: Tracklist: 1 - Inconsistency - INTRO 2 - Waiting for your suicide 3 - Mirror of void mirror 4 - Mind Punishment 5 - The Flesh 6 - Dechoerence 7 - Life is beautiful but, sometimes, hard porn is better? 8 - Enumerate Muriatic Breakdown 9 - Unforgotten Scream 10 - Colossal Misanthropy 11 - In death's frequency 12 - Faces of paradoxical existence Recordered and mixed at 16th Cellar Studio - Rome, Italy Mastered by Alan Douches in NY, USA (Killswitch Engage,Unearth,Emmure,Carnifex,The Acacia Strain,Terror,Cannibal Corpse,Ion Dissonance,Hate Eternal) In stores with Rising Records UK in February 2010. Payable with Paypal and Postepay. Shipping cost will be 4€ for Italy, 7.50€ for the other countrys. Per chi acquista dall'Italia: accettiamo pagamenti anche tramite ricarica postepay. Se intendete pagare con questo metodo non ordinate qui ma contattateci per i dettagli info@corroosion.com
